name: Dug'n
description:
Created in one week for #LOWREZJAM2016, a 64x64 pixel game challenge.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dug'n is a fast-paced digging game.
Dig your way to the bottom of the earth to uncover secret caves.
Don't run out of air.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Note:
Pick up air to survive.
You can break grey tiles, just keep hitting them.
It gets harder as you go.
It saves your highest level on the 'game over' screen.

Controls:
w,a,s,d or arrows to move
m - mute

Hint:
Worms are attracted to air. Follow the worms.

Music by Ozzed.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
